title: There is a player called homoslayer.
body: Change this guys name. I don't need to tell you why. And yes I'm telling you what to do because frankly it should have already been changed

replies.body:
'homo' does not in fact refer to anyone's sexual preference. 

The word 'homo' translates to 'man', so his name translates to man slayer. There is nothing wrong with that, unless you are objecting that his name is sexist, in which case you would be wrong again, because 'homo' means man(kind), not male man.
I gotta agree with Young Girl Milk here, tempnameA486.

Yep it's s pun 

rationalising and tolerating bigotry isn't going to make the game better

i know I shouldn't feed trolls but well done young girl milking.
On a serious note though this topic problem needs to be resolved
